makerCards.title: Cbarn.es Classic
makerCards.description: An implementation of Cbarn.es inspired by the experience one would have using the IBM PC.
makerCards.tools: Tools: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS. Hosted on Dreamhost's Cloud Compute Platform using Apache and Flask.

makerCards.title: Droom Marketing Page
makerCards.description: A demo marketing page designed and built over the course of a week during Lambda School.
makerCards.tools: Tools: JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, LESS, Semantic HTML. Hosted using GitHub Pages.

makerCards.title: React/Redux Book Search
makerCards.description: A front-end site build during Lambda School in order to improve abilities with React and Redux.
makerCards.tools: Tools: React, Redux, Axios, SASS, Open Library API. Deployed using ZEIT.

makerCards.title: Crypto Toolbox
makerCards.description: A Google Chrome Extension that allows users to easily track prices of any crypto currency along with tools to track news, portfolio value, and convert between currencies.
makerCards.tools: Tools: JavaScript, JQuery, D3.js, Crypto Compare streaming API, HTML, CSS.

makerCards.title: Yield Curve Inversion Watch
makerCards.description: A Twitter Bot that tweets the market close difference between two-year and ten-year treasury bond yields every business day.
makerCards.tools: Tools: Python, Tweepy, Matplotlib, Numpy, US Treasury Department XML data. Hosted on Dreamhost's Cloud Compute Platform.

makerCards.title: POTUS Approval
makerCards.description: A Twitter Bot that tweets the United States President's net approval rating along with the precent change from the previous tweet.
makerCards.tools: Tools: Python, Tweepy, FiveThirtyEight's presidential approval data. Hosted on Dreamhost's Cloud Compute Platform.

makerCards.title: Evolution Simulation
makerCards.description: A basic visual simulation of evolution with entities of random, heritable, health values.

makerCards.title: Land Grant Goods Supplychain Solution
makerCards.description: A blockchain based, supplychain tracking system created as a team with members of Spartan Blockchain Solutions.
makerCards.tools: Tools: Hyperledger, Angular, TypeScript, Docker, Bash, HTML, CSS.

makerCards.title: Cbarn.es
makerCards.description: This website, created using entirely custom code and limited frameworks.
makerCards.tools: Tools: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS. Hosted on Dreamhost's Cloud Compute Platform using Apache and Flask.

about.description: I make things. Preferably with code, occasionally with words. Currently studying Web Development at Lambda School.
